description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Remote Code Execution vulnerability associated with the Microsoft ODBC Driver (CVE-2024-21347), it is recommended to apply the relevant updates based on your Windows version:

1. Identify the appropriate update for your system build from the list below:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5034765
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5034765
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5034766
   - Windows 10 Versions: KB5034774 or KB5034763 as applicable.

2. Download the update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
   - [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
   - [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

3. Install the update and restart your system to complete the installation process.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability, preventing potential exploitation through remote code execution. 
- Ensure that your Windows version matches one of the supported build numbers provided.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with updates to prevent any data loss during installation.
